mapper.update: update ammeter_node set nodeCode = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemDecipt = #{itemDecipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemKey = #{itemKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemValue = #{itemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
